name: PublishToCMP
friendlyName: Publish to Orckestra's Cloud Management Platform
description: Publish deployment packages to Orckestra's Cloud Management Platform.
author: Orckestra Technologies Inc.
instanceNameFormat: Publish deployment packages to Orckestra's Cloud Management Platform

inputs.name: cmpUrl
inputs.label: CMP URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to CMP. Invariably, https://api.orckestra.cloud

inputs.name: cmpUsername
inputs.label: CMP username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username used to access CMP. See also [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#cmp-connection).

inputs.name: cmpPassword
inputs.label: CMP password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password associated with the CMP username.

inputs.name: cmpClientCode
inputs.label: Client Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: The code of the client in CMP for which uploaded packages will be available. See also [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#pubcmp-clientcode).

inputs.name: cmpPackageFolder
inputs.label: Packages Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where to search for packages to upload to CMP.

inputs.name: cmpStability
inputs.label: Package stability (Release, PreRelease, Develop)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the CMP feed where packages are uploaded. Recognized values: Release, PreRelease, Develop.

inputs.name: cmpPackagesList
inputs.label: Packages to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies which files to upload. See [syntax specification](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#pubcmp-packages-filter).

inputs.name: cmpPackagesListFilterType
inputs.label: Packages list filter type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format used for each line of the package list. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#pubcmp-packages-filter-type).

inputs.name: currentBuildNumber
inputs.label: This build's version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
If any 'optional version target' is specified in parameter 'Packages to upload' above, this build version is compared against it to determine whether the package should be uploaded or not. It must be in a format `\d+\.\d+.*`

You can use the value `$(Build.BuildNumber)` when this task is in a release pipeline and `$(GitVersion.NuGetVersion)` when the task is in a build pipeline. You can hardcode a version (e.g.: 0.0) if you cannot use a build variable.
